slide-2.title: How to Play
content: This game is played with 3 cards. 2 main cards (Dragon and Tiger) will compete to see which side has the highest value. 1 wild card is drawn to form a Bonus Wild combination.
You can bet on the Main Bet: Dragon/Tiger. Or on the wild bet combinations: Dragon Wild, Dragon Pair or Tiger Wild, Tiger Pair, and Super Wild.
